nodes.text: The suspension tank chamber was a Rakatan facility in The Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. Located in the Ancient Rakatan Keep region, the chamber was overrun by the Esh-kha species during the invasion of Belsavis, but Republic forces secured the chamber and encountered the Rakatan artificial intelligence Failsafe, which implored the Republic to prevent the Esh-kha from releasing the World Razer.
The suspension tank chamber appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Republic mission "Failsafe."
